standard of living.translation[0].defini: the amount of wealth, comfort, and other things that a particular person, group, country etc has
a nation with a high standard of living
standard of living.translation[1].defini: the amount of wealth or comfort that a person, group, or country has
Two incomes are generally required tomaintain a decent middle-class standard of living.
New businesses have created higher-paying jobs that give millions of people a far higher standard of living.
